bug.author: WanderingSven
bug.summary: python: can't open file 'check_install.py': [Errno 2] No such file or directory
bug.description: hello,everyone. When I install neural_sp, the error that "python: can't open file 'check_install.py': [Errno 2] No such file or directory" occur. At the same time, I cannot find check_install.py. what should I do to solve this problem. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26950286/85841057-1d3f7500-b7d0-11ea-8086-d345dea99986.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: hello, I have the same problem. Have you solved it ? thank you
